getGoodPoints

public java.util.ArrayList<Point> getGoodPoints(char c,
                                                char[][] matrix,
                                                java.util.ArrayList<Point> oldPoints)
returns all valid points for a certain character as the next character of a word. This character has to be at an an adjacent field to the last character of the already placed ones and has to be located on an empty field or one with the same letter and that is not yet used in the word.

Parameters:
c - the character of the next letter. This is the letter for which all valid positions are requested.
matrix - the current state of the board matrix. Empty fields must be filled with the null character '\0'.
oldPoints - a collection of all points of the word up to the letter before the given one. The last element of this list contains the letter that is coming directly before the given one. An empty list is indicating, that the given letter is the first one of the word. A null object is considered to be an empty list.
